title: How an I contact riot company directly I have some ideas for the company !?
body: Hello it’s about 2 months I’m trying to find the way to contact riot company I have some ideas that I’m sure can make a lot of good changes and benefit for riot company and I don’t wanna just post it there so please tell me the way that I can. Meet or talk about these things with company directly

replies.body: You're always free to submit a ticket with any ideas you might have! You can find that right over here-> [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)
